review: Still discovering it. great so far.
author: Ronald

review: I was disappointed ! takes way  too long time to download something, then the screen is freezing several times and in addition you don't really have to much free stuff to watch. So, I sent it back !
author: Lucky6302

review: Still deciding if I should return it, so far had blue screen with error message "HDCP unauthorized. Content disabled" two times. Tried moving stick to another HDMI input, with or without HDMI extender cable, and removing USB from it's power adapter. Only fix for me was to reset my Sony Bravia TV back to factory settings. Then re-enter time date and scan for channels  again on the TV. I've only had the Fire TV Stick for 2 weeks and reset TV twice.
author: Keith

review: Its works really well. It exceeded my expectations.
author: Jonita Harris

review: A little different to navigate from Apple TV but worth it bc it costs less.
author: mp

review: No cable, no satellite but I do have radio transmitted hi speed internet. This little plug in makes a world of difference! Great to actually have options for entertainment beside the standard over the air TV.
author: Jam Debris

review: I love the Fire TV stick. Lots of new apps
author: Amazon Customer
